events.text:
Anything of use yet Owlnu?
     (he pauses)
Oh. Books. You've found books. How... helpful. 
I will admit it's rather quaint for the humans to pretend to gain higher knowledge.

Don't listen to him, I think it's a wonderful thing to see humans explore so many possibilities. 
I've never been read stories, have you?

It's a warm thing they've picked up, to comfort each other. 
His favorite to read were childrens books! 
I remember now! Wait! That's right! He had a daughter. 
I wonder where she is...
